channel.title: Finding gateway please help
channel.description:
hi ive got problems to find my gateway
they said me to do this click on start> run> cmd> and type ipconfig
but it doesnt work because i get an little black screen on my pc and then i see really fast some letters and it dissapears in one second or something
so my question is is there an other way to find your gateway to make a private server on moparscape?? thanks very much

item.title: Finding gateway please help
item.dc:creator: @Aurai Aurai
item.description:
@Aurai wrote:

o.O
Make a batch file (with the extension .bat) and put the following code in it and run it:
(Or edit your runserver and put this code in it and run it)

ipconfig
pause

Read full topic
